exceptions.tactic: intros m z t H1 H2 H3 sr nr H4 H5.

exceptions.exn: Applied theorem does not have enough premises.
Applied theorem does not have enough premises.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m t -> let sr := Iter_rem m z in let nr := Iter_upb m z in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (f m) i z = t}

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
Iter_rem = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => Iter_rem_aux m z (fmap_to_set m) : fmap -> dart -> set
Iter = fix Iter (g : dart -> dart) (n : nat) (z : dart) {struct n} : dart := match n with | 0%nat => z | S n0 => g (Iter g n0 z) end : (dart -> dart) -> nat -> dart -> dart Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope _]
exds = fix exds (s : set) (z : dart) {struct s} : Prop := match s with | Vs => False | Is s0 x => x = z \/ exds s0 z end : set -> dart -> Prop
f = M.f : fmap -> dart -> dart
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
dart = nat : Set
Iter_upb = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => (ndN m - card (Iter_rem m z))%nat : fmap -> dart -> nat
ex_i_aux : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds s t -> (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (f m) i z = t}
P4 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds s t -> (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (f m) i z = t} : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Set
L3 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0
L2 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 -> ~ exds (Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds x zn0)) t
PL3 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Prop
not_exds_Iter_f_i : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), let sr := Iter_rem m z in let n := Iter_upb m z in (i <= n)%nat -> ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) i z)
PL2 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 -> ~ exds (Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds x zn0)) t : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Prop
exds_Iter_f_i : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let s := Iter_orb m z in let n := Iter_upb m z in (i <= n)%nat -> exds s (Iter (f m) i z)
LR3 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set), ~ exds s t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t
R3 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set) => ~ exds s t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Prop
exd_Iter_orb_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let n := Iter_upb m z in exds (Iter_orb m z) (Iter (f m) n z)
LR1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat) (s : set), let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let n := Iter_upb_aux m z s in (ndN m - card s <= i <= n)%nat -> ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) i z)
R1 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat) (s : set) => let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let n := Iter_upb_aux m z s in (ndN m - card s <= i <= n)%nat -> ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) i z) : fmap -> dart -> nat -> set -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ _ nat_scope _]
P1 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let n := Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) n z) : fmap -> dart -> set -> Prop
exds_rem_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m t -> ~ exds (Iter_rem m z) t < -> exds (Iter_orb m z) t
not_exds_rem_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let n := Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) n z)
R2 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) (ndN m - card s) z) : fmap -> dart -> set -> Prop
not_exds_Iter_rem_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), let n := Iter_upb m z in ~ exds (Iter_rem m z) (Iter (f m) n z)
LR2 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) (ndN m - card s) z)
exd_Iter_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (Iter (f m) (Iter_upb m z) z)
not_exds_diff : forall (s : set) (z : dart), ~ exds s z -> forall t : dart, exds s t -> z <> t
upb_pos : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), exd m z -> (0 < Iter_upb m z)%nat
exd_Iter_f : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (f m) n z)
nopred_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> bottom m k z = z
exd_not_nil : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> z <> nil
exd_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (M.f_1 m z)
exd_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (M.f m z)
exd_Iter_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (f_1 m) n z)
Iter_rem_aux_equation : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (sx : set), Iter_rem_aux m z sx = (let n := (ndN m - card sx)%nat in let zn := Iter (f m) n z in if exds_dec sx zn then Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds sx zn) else sx)
Fin.to_nat = fix to_nat (m : nat) (n : Fin.t m) {struct n} : {i : nat | (i < m)%nat} := match n in (Fin.t n0) return {i : nat | (i < n0)%nat} with | @Fin.F1 j => exist (fun i : nat => (i < S j)%nat) 0%nat (Nat.lt_0_succ j) | @Fin.FS n0 p => let (i, P) := to_nat n0 p in exist (fun i0 : nat => (i0 < S n0)%nat) (S i) (lt_n_S i n0 P) end : forall m : nat, Fin.t m -> {i : nat | (i < m)%nat} Argument m is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [nat_scope _]
upb_pos_aux : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), exd m z -> (card (Iter_rem m z) < ndN m)%nat
exd_exds : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), exd m z < -> exds (fmap_to_set m) z
OMEGA7 : forall x y z t : Z, z > 0 -> t > 0 -> 0 <= x -> 0 <= y -> 0 <= x * z + y * t
prec_L = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart) => exd m x /\ exd m y /\ ~ succ m k x /\ ~ pred m k y /\ cA m k x <> y : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> Prop
LQ2 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), exds s (Iter (f m) (ndN m - card s) z) -> (card (Iter_rem_aux m z s) < card s)%nat
Q2 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => exds s (Iter (f m) (ndN m - card s) z) -> (card (Iter_rem_aux m z s) < card s)%nat : fmap -> dart -> set -> Prop
prec_I = fun (m : fmap) (x : dart) => x <> nil /\ ~ exd m x : fmap -> dart -> Prop
Nzorn : forall I : nat -> Prop, (exists n : nat, I n) -> Nbound I -> {n : nat | I n /\ (forall i : nat, I i -> (i <= n)%nat)}
exds_set_minus : forall (s1 s2 : set) (z : dart), exds s1 z -> ~ exds s2 z -> exds (set_minus s1 s2) z
Iter_upb_aux = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => (ndN m - card (Iter_rem_aux m z s))%nat : fmap -> dart -> set -> nat

```  
intros m z t H1 H2 H3 sr nr H4 H5.
exists (ndN m - card (Iter_rem m z)); split.
* apply Nat.sub_lt; auto.
* unfold nr, sr.
  apply Iter_rem_aux_equation with (sx:= fmap_to_set m).
  intros H6. apply H5.
  apply exds_set_minus; auto.
```

original: intros m z t H1 H2 H3 sr nr H4 H5. exists (ndN m - card (Iter_rem m z)); split. * apply Nat.sub_lt; auto. * unfold nr, sr. apply Iter_rem_aux_equation with (sx:= fmap_to_set m). intros H6. apply H5. apply exds_set_minus; auto.
